name: Call Your Shot
summary: When you successfully Play to the Crowd, add additional benefits to the list you can choose from.
description:
When you successfully Play to the Crowd, add the following to the list of benefits you can choose from:Choose a creature within 30 feet that can see you to become frightened 1. This effect has the emotion, fear, mental, and visual traits.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
